name: FlickBazar
tag_list: classified, website, india, buy, sell, rent
description: One stop buy, sell and rent
overview:
FlickBazar is India’s first online platform interface where users can not only buy and sell products and services online, but also rent in and out products and services of all categories. We are committed to creating a user community of individuals who identify a temporary need of a product or service and are naturally not willing to buy every time. We connect such a user need to the users who are willing to share their resources, products or services for a stipulated period of time. By this, we wish to promote transumerism across Indian towns and cities because transumerism is the growing trend of the future, and not mere consumerism.

We also cater to general consumer needs through classifieds which span across different categories. Through this section, we are committed to create a user community platform of buy and sell products and services.

Apart from the consumer segment, FlickBazar also connects to fledgling business entities who wish to grow their business through effective marketing and advertising. Our business segment connects these businesses to the user community through classifieds, online ad campaigns and promotions.

Welcome to the world of FlickBazar! Buy, Sell, Rent. It’s your world, your online destination for consumer or business solutions. We are committed to serve you and assist you in our best manner possible.
